channel.title: SoftLayer_Location on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Location on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Location
item.description: SoftLayer_Location Service Datatype Description Every piece of hardware and network connection owned by SoftLayer is tracked physically by location and stored in the SoftLayer_Location data type. SoftLayer locations exist in parent/child relationships, a convenient way to track equipment from it’s city, datacenter, server room, rack, then slot. Network backbones are tied to datacenters only, not to a room, rack, or slot. Local euCompliantFlag Type: boolean
